Title: Godomar Barrowes
Text:
Gaffer Gamgee is sure to know which hobbits have the best stories to tell of Bilbo's disappearance and his adventures and whereabouts since then.

Return to Gaffer after speaking to all of the hobbits.

Godomar Barrowes has agreed to share a story about Bilbo Baggins and his adventures.
CompleteText: Looking for stories about Bilbo, are you now? Well as Postman, I know most people and hear most things. I can certainly spare the time to tell you a tale.
